se.fredin.jayplayer.service

Class TrackService

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.fredin.jayplayer.service.TrackService

  • public class TrackService
extends java.lang.Object
    TrackService manages all users Track objects.
    Author:
    johan

        public int nextId()
